text: A directed energy weapon that preceded the phaser; emits collimated beams of particle energy through a phase modulation field.
A directed energy weapon that preceded the phaser; emits collimated beams of particle energy through a phase modulation field.
An extremely heavy phaser, for use on dedicated defensive platforms.
When fired in rapid, concentrated bursts, phasers rapidly burn through armoring.
A light phaser emitter on a turret, intended for lighter ships and basic defense.
The standard in defensive weapons for starships, the phaser emitter puts considerable energy out with high accuracy.
The standard in defensive weapons for starships, the phaser emitter puts considerable energy out with high accuracy.
A high yield phaser emitter with a more potent phase modulation field, allowing it to cut through shields more easily.
An extremely heavy phaser, for use on dedicated defensive platforms.
Phaser banks combine phaser emitters with independent power and targeting systems, allowing them to operate independently and with more power than centrally connected phaser emitters.
A heavy mount phaser bank, intended for heavy combat.

Phaser Cannons utilize advanced phaser technology from the future, introduced via an alternate, mirror universe. Their destructive power far surpasses any yet seen in this universe.

Using attenuated red matter, these torpedoes are able to inflict devastating damage to all known defensive systems, without causing a chain-reacting singularity which could damage the attacking vessel.

Disruptor Cannons are a directed energy weapon, favored by the Klingon Empire and Romulan Star Empire. They generally carry more energy than standard phaser weapons, but suffer from reduced accuracy and rate of discharge.

A phaser strip is a series of phaser emitters laid out contiguously, so that their power can be combined in a single discharge. Some engineers are known to colloquially use the term "strip" instead of phaser array, to distinguish smaller groups of emitters that do not output full, military strength.

Microtorpedos are miniaturized versions of the ubiquitous photon torpedo. They have less destructive power than their full-sized brethren, but benefit from requiring a drastically smaller launch assembly and storage profile.

Black Fleet torpedoes forego traditional large photonic armaments for smaller isogenic charges. While the rarity of isogen normally restricts these weapons to relatively small payloads, they can easily be scaled should more isogen become easily available. In this scenario, they become fearsome, high-powered burst weapons.

Isogenic Cannons modulate the energy present in raw isogen into directed energy attacks. The power of this weapon is directly proportional to the amount of isogen used as a catalyst: In situations where isogen is freely available, it packs a tremendous punch.
An extremely heavy phaser, for use on dedicated defensive platforms.

Black Fleet armor plating represents the ultimate expression of the Klingon Empire's battle philosophy. Hiding behind shields is not the Klingon way: Face your enemy directly, with only the strength of your arm and the might of your steel to guide you.

Armor provides a defensive bonus in combat.
Battleship Armor provides a huge bonus to defense in combat. It can only be fitted to Battleship types.
Energy Weapons can be fitted to ships to inflict damage in combat.
Explorer Shields provide stronger Shield defense in combat. They can only be fitted to Explorer types.
Impulse Engines increase a ship’s ability to Dodge attacks while in combat.
Interceptor Engines give extreme bonuses to Dodge during combat. They can only be fitted to Interceptor types.
Kinetic Weapons can be fitted to ships to inflict damage in combat.
With a Mining Laser fitted to a ship, it can mine for materials and resources at various mining locations throughout the galaxy.
Shields protect a ship’s Hull from taking damage when hit by enemies in combat.
Warp Drives allow ships to travel to further star systems and at greater speeds.
